channel.title: B School on Dan's Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in B School on Dan's Ramblings

item.title: Why I applied to business school
item.description: Why I applied I’m in my fourth year of software engineering at Google. It’s a great job. I’ve learned a ton and I’ve met interesting people. The community that I feel comes from outside of work. The group thread for my improv class is pretty vibrant and we do fun things together. I’m grateful for them. That’s what feels good to me – feeling connected, and feeling like I’m part of something bigger than myself.
